rules.name: FallingBlockDieAge
rules.description: Age in gameticks at which falling blocks die, -1 for infinity. (Vanilla is 600)

rules.name: FallingBlockNoFrictionWithWalls
rules.description: Falling blocks over walls would not have friction with the floor as in 1.12

rules.name: FarmableClay
rules.description: Lets dispensers convert dirt into clay with water bottles

rules.name: SleepingDelay
rules.description: Sets the game-ticks of delay when you sleep in a bed (Vanilla is 100)

rules.name: ThunderWarn
rules.description: The amount of ticks before thunderstorm that are needed for the mod to warn you about it
